mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member SET mem_id = #{memID}, mem_pwd = #{memPwd}, mem_name = #{memName}, mem_email = #{memEmail}, mem_regdate = now()
mapper.select: SELECT mem_num AS memNum, mem_id AS memID, mem_pwd AS memPwd, mem_name AS memName, mem_email AS memEmail, mem_regdate AS memRegdate, mem_level AS memLevel, mem_confirm AS memConfirm FROM member ORDER BY mem_num DESC
SELECT COUNT(mem_id) FROM member WHERE mem_id = #{memID}
